name: Ball Merge 3D 2048
description:
Don't miss the unique merge puzzle experience!

RULES are simple:
⭐️ Let the balls with the same numbers touch and get one ball with total number of both
⭐️ Don't exceed the max balls number

New 3D game based on 2048!
Greate Time-killer.
Play anywhere, anytime.
Use your brain while having fun.

Don`t hesitate to share the game with your friends, I am sure they will like it too ;)
